personalInformations.name: Selma ÄŒokljat
personalInformations.description: Software Developer adept in bringing forth expertise in design, testing and maintenance of web applications. Proficient in various platforms and languages. Experienced with the latest cutting edge development tools and procedures. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate as part of a productive team.
personalInformations.contactDescription: You can visit me on my linkedIn profile or view my gitHub profile :
personalInformations.aboutDescription: I'm Selma and I graduated with a master's degree in electrical engineering. A year ago, I started actively learning programming. I was studying Node JS for backend and React with Redux for frontend development. I also made one project with Vue JS on an internship. I prefer the frontend development because it's closer to user. Making the UI of website is very interesting to me. I want to progress a lot and I'm currently learning Next JS. I'm communicative and friendly person.

projects.name: e-commerce
projects.description: An e-commerce web app for online shopping with stripe payment form.

projects.name: Ask app
projects.description: An application where registered users can ask questions and answer questions from other registered users. Registered users can also like and dislike the questions and answers they want.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: It's my personal webiste with my resume and all my projects.

projects.name: Movies app
projects.description: The app has functionalities of displaying the top 10 rated TV shows and the top 10 movies, a search function for both and a detailed view for individual items.

projects.name: Welcome Bot
projects.description: A no-code platform for building slack bots.

projects.name: Instagram Clone
projects.description: A small, lean and pretty project based learning results heavily inspired by Instagram.

projects.name: Confessions app
projects.description: The user can post his confession and answer anonymously. Also he can like and dislike confessions.

projects.name: Employee management
projects.description: A simple app made with Next JS where the user can add a new employee with his status and salary. He can also delete and update current employees.

projects.name: Coronavirus statistcs
projects.description: A simple app of the statistics of people infected and dead from the coronavirus.
